clinical_study.brief_title: A Pilot Study Of Riluzole In Patients With Post Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD)
clinical_study.official_title: An Investigation of the Effects of Riluzole in Patients With Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD)

brief_summary.textblock: This open label study will evaluate the safety and efficacy of riluzole in patients with PTSD. Patients will receive riluzole 50mg twice per day orally for 12 weeks as outpatient, with a one month follow up at week 16.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Clinician Administered PTSD Scale (CAPS)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Every four weeks up to 12 weeks

other_outcome.measure: Quick Inventory of Depressive Symptoms - Self-Report (QIDS-SR)

arm_group.description: Riluzole 50 mg orally twice per day

overall_official.affiliation: National Center for PTSD / Yale University

facility.name: Clinical Neuroscience Division, National Center for PTSD
